Jonathan graduated from the University of California, Santa Cruz (UCSC) with a B.S. in marine biology. During his time at UCSC, he interned for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Fisheries Ecology Division, researching how ocean conditions influence fecundity in rockfish species.
